Akeno decided to speak with the Lady NPC in her 40s, believing her to be working or even owns the shop herself. Akeno walks over to her and spoke, hoping to get a response this time.

"Pardon me?" Akeno asked the NPC. The Lady NPC turns to Akeno directly, looking at Akeno entirely. Akeno was bit uneasy about the lady and was about to leave but the Lady NPC responded.

"Hello and welcome to the shop~. Is there something that can be of interest for you young adventurer~" The Lady NPC spoke with some... glee. Akeno still felt wary about the NPC but at least she knew that the NPC worked in the shop. Akeno began to ask about the items in the store. The NPC showed her various items. They seem.... standard according what Issei normally told her about shops: HP recovery items, low grade equipment, food, and some more. As Akeno contemplated what to buy, the NPC Lady brought out a potion.

"I see you are having a hard time choosing. Might I make a special offer?" The NPC Lady asked presenting a strange potion of some sort. Akeno raised and eyebrow, she couldn't tell what the potion was. Perhaps she could in the real world with her devil abilities and magic, but she's in a video game. Different rules. "What is that potion?" Akeno asked the NPC Lady whom smiled at the response.

"This is a special Status Item that targets you and another. Drink part of this potion and splash the rest of it on your target and both of you will swap something. Buff and Debuffs, Equipment, and more.If you can [Focus] you can swap something specific but if you use it with haste, the swap will be random." The NPC Lady spoke with interest. Akeno looked at the potion, thinking if she could really use this kind of potion. Akeno asked for a price, a bit suspicious of the offer, and NPC Lady gave her a cheap price. VERY cheap. Akeno would think it's a scam but she did want to see if could work.

"I'm curious about this potion, but I want to make sure I'm not being scammed. Low price or not." Akeno responded.

The Lady NPC spoke....

She puts on the table for Akeno, should she decide to take a sample. However, Akeno had a strange feeling about all this. "Well you could go out and test it on the wild life but you don't know what you will encounter. Perhaps you should test a more willing subject? In fact! Why not try it on me? I'm the one selling this to you, should anything happen it's my responsibility." The NPC Lady responded.

It's not like she didn't have her friends in the game to test it out with. Asia might be willing to try it out. All though... maybe Akeno should keep it a secret of a surprise?

Akeno looks in horror just in time to see the NPC(?) tap something in the air. Everything then went black....

"Well I do really thank you for the release from my Statues as A NPC. An I welcome you as the new NPC Shop Keeper. That was something I had never heard of and was quite curious about it. After he started to talk error appeared but he just keep talking about his world. But I could never leave this world" Said the new Akeno.

"A few days had gone by and Mil Tan brought very nice young man with him. Issei was his name I believe. He was a very gullible child and told me all about devils and how they grant wish's. Well I asked if he could free me from this place and with a straight face said he could not do that. You had to have a body in his world to link out to to be free and he could not do that to any one of his friends or lovers" Said the new Akeno.

The original Akeno's shock had faded and was glad to hear that Issei was not to blame for her situation at this time. But she still had to wonder what had cause this.

So how did you do this then what was the point of it all" the orginal Akeno said.

The ex shop keeper stared and said.

" Well when the only thing you can do is sell potions and then you are given something new to do and see would you not take that path. It was that youth Mil Tan that gave me the potion and sample he some how had made it in the game to try to switch his gender. He came to me to find out if the potion could do that. After using one of my many skills to check out the potion I was amazed that it would switch a NPC like me and the Player like you. I gave Mil Tan a potion and told him to drink it I said it would make him feel better. Really it just let me control him".

The original Akeno was surprised now not from the story but from the fact that she was forgetting thing from her life.

"Ah the next part of the swap is finally kicking in your memories will now be over written with my own and you will start to act the part of the shop keeper next. I will keep all of my own memories and get yours. That way I will have your class and my own witch class as well. Oh you will be a lvl 1 villagers after all this is done. But let us keep going with the story" the New Akeno said.

" Well the orders i gave to Mil Tan was to get a nice looking girl into the game and he could only think of a few from his devil friend Issei. So I said that would do. He would give Issei the game console and tell Issei to play it with the girls. Then it would only be a matter of time before one of you came to my store. And here you are. Oh did you feel that of course you did not you dont even know what I am talking about right now" said Akeno.

A smile on her face the New Akeno agreed to the deal. She would need to free a few people from this place so that she could deal with everything in the new world. "Hey Akeno you in here" yelled Issei.
